CHANGES
=======

1.0.3
------

- Support for tests running up to Django 1.7 and Python 3.4

1.0.2
------

- Fixed issue with get_host() function in Django 1.5

1.0.1
------

- Fixed SSL_REQUEST_HEADER setting to use the custom setting, if available (Thanks Gabriel Grant)

1.0
------

- Initial Release
